what: pkgdown template for rnabioco R packages
title: pkgdown template for rnabioco R packages
text: pkgdown template websites across RBI. sites, ensure DESCRIPTION contains: add package _pkgdown.yml:
code: Config/Needs/website:     pkgdown,     rnabioco/rbitemplate template:   package: rbitemplate   bootstrap: 5
